bike.description: C5 high-modulus carbon, integrated head tube w/ 1 1/2" lower, oversized PIIS BB86 shell, double water bottle mounts. Rear triangle: C5 high-modulus carbon thin seatstays, oversized chainstays, carbon dropout w/ replaceable hanger

components.description: FC-770 carbon fork blades w/ tapered alloy steerer
Shimano Ultegra STI shifter/brake combo, Flight Deck-compatible, 20-speed
Oval 327 aero alloy clincher, 20/24H sealed bearing hubs, stainless bladed spokes
Vittoria Zaffiro Pro Slick, 60 tpi, 700c x 23mm, folding
FSA Orbit C-40, 1 1/8" upper - 1 1/2" lower, integrated
Oval R500 w/ CrMo hollow rails
